info.title: Hero City 2
info.author: ThatOtherPerson
info.details:
Hero City 2 is an open world game about a super hero.

This game has an online leaderboard.

Controls:
Analog stick = Move
Directional pad = Turn the camera
Shake wiimote = Right fisted punch
Shake nunchuck = Left fisted punch
A button = Jump (hold to charge up for a higher jump)
Z button = Turn the camera in the same direction as the player
1 button = Save
2 button = Return to the title screen
+ or - button (at the title screen) = Change the language

Author:
